column4: q: do they have to have a username/password just to print to a printer on a Linux box?
I don't know, I think that can work a little differently.  (I'm basically regurgitating here; I was walked through it only a few weeks ago.)
My SWAT is dead too, I overwrote something for it so I can't access it.  Had to do stuff manually.
Didn't even know that.  I was just trying some port on the loopback address in my browser.
